data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silveira, Fernando A. (2009): A synopsis of Actenosigynes Moure, Graf & Urban, 1999 (Hymenoptera: Colletidae) — new species, possible oligolecty and biogeographic comments. Zootaxa 2292: 15-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191457
